message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present you with an opportunity to own our premium product, which holds significant value to both of us. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I believe it's worth more than its face value. Considering its true worth, I am offering it to you for $15,000. This special price reflects my confidence in its value and my desire to ensure you receive the best possible deal. Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations or if you would like to discuss other options. I look forward to your positive response.
